quoteText:
e respect your data and provide tools ready for you at our interface to delete and/or download them.
The exported archives are stored on our servers for 48 hours and then permanently deleted.
You can request an archive once every 30 days but not because we dont like privacy, but rather want to save bandwith, storage and processing power as the service we offer, is completely free.
title: This service provides a way for you to export your data

tosdr.case: This service provides a way for you to export your data
